Name: Project Sparrow
About the game: Fight alone or along side your allies in this arena based PvP archery game, created solely by Dids. Focusing primarily on fast paced arena gameplay, providing the game with a perfect place for balance and iteration before exploring additional mechanics and gamemodes. ENTER THE ARENA Fight alone or with your allies through multiple arenas and gamemodes. Take aim in a Duel, fight alongside your allies in 2v2 and 3v3, or boot up a deathmatch for some practise. YOUR PLAYSTYLE Every round, players can choose between multiple arrows types and utility equipment. Appear behind your enemies with the shadow arrow, deny areas with fire arrows or cover up openings with smoke. TRAINING AND TRIALS Perfect your aim in the training range, providing different target types against AI and Bots, or enter the Infinity Trials and perfect your time against everyone else in the world. DEDICATED SERVERS AND PLAYER COUNT Please note queue times for matchmaking may be long, please use the Discord server if you are struggling to find a game. Dedicated server region availability is currently only supported in the following regions, more regions will be available soon. EU-CENTRAL (Frankfurt) US-EAST (Ohio) US-WEST (California) AP-SOUTHEAST (Sydney) AP-NORTHEAST (Japan) SA-EAST (SÃ£o Paulo) AP-SOUTEAST-1 (Singapore) ME-SOUTH-1 (Bahrain) CUSTOM GAMES AND SPECTATING Fire up a custom lobby with your friends, or setup tournament games. Up to 4 spectators are allowed in all customs games, spectator keybinds can be find in the input menu.
